resources.string: Are you sure? This will clear all your work!
Shows and hides the painting toolbox.
Use this to choose from a wide variety of brush styles. You can mix and match for original effects.
Clear the drawing, the imported picture, or both.
Choose the file name and save the current painting to external storage.
Share the picture with the world. It must be saved first.
Import a picture from the gallery to edit.
Toggle the shake feature on and off. When on, shake the phone for a random color.
Choose from many different brush sizes using the slider.
Save the Current Painting Before Sharing
Choose a color you\'ve used with the dropper. Just touch the desired color and the paint will be updated to match.

Want to import pics? Pro Paint does that.

 - Import pictures
 - No more ads
 - Impress everyone with your drawing

 Only a buck! Thanks!
